channel.title: Custom Launcher in the works
channel.description:
I am writing a custom Launcher specifically for Moparcraft. It will be based on the Spoutcraft source code. I plan to simplify it down to 10 or less classes, and remove lots of code that we don't need. For example, the Spoutcraft launcher downloads a mod that gets automatically installed into minecraft.
Progress: [ul][li][s][b]Name and logo's changed over.[/b][/s] - Used favicon from the site, and patched up a logo in Photoshop.[/li] [li][b]Removed spoutcraft specific code.[/b][/li] [li][s][b]"Crack" the login method.[/b][/s] - Seriously far easier than cracking official minecraft since I had the original source.[/li] [li][b]Put in my own auto-updating code from my old launcher.[/b][i] - Started.[/i][/li] [li][b]Simplify the launcher.[/b][/li][/ul]
EDIT: As I was asked over MSN: Yes this client [b]will[/b] be released with a source code download as well.

item.title: Custom Launcher in the works
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:3, topic:435850”][quote author=Travas link=topic=538571.msg3940744#msg3940744 date=1331405155]
That’s pretty cool, I’d use it for sure
[/quote]
Off topic, but do you actually have the minecraft account named herobrine? o.o[/quote]Most likely not his account.
And coon, good luck with the laucher, what other features do you plan on adding?
I would like to see irc support if possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom Launcher in the works
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I am writing a custom Launcher specifically for Moparcraft. It will be based on the Spoutcraft source code. I plan to simplify it down to 10 or less classes, and remove lots of code that we don’t need. For example, the Spoutcraft launcher downloads a mod that gets automatically installed into minecraft.

Progress:
[ul][li]Name and logo’s changed over. - Used favicon from the site, and patched up a logo in Photoshop.[/li]
[li]Removed spoutcraft specific code.[/li]
[li]“Crack” the login method. - Seriously far easier than cracking official minecraft since I had the original source.[/li]
[li]Put in my own auto-updating code from my old launcher. - Started.[/li]
[li]Simplify the launcher.[/li][/ul]

EDIT: As I was asked over MSN: Yes this client will be released with a source code download as well.

Read full topic
